mapper.sql: s.id,s.open_id,s.product_no,s.product_num,s.customer_name ,s.id_card,s.phone_num,s.play_time,s.status,s.sort,s.checked ,s.create_time,s.update_time,(SELECT user_name from payment_user where user_no= s.application_no limit 1) as application_no
mapper.select: select from shopping_cart s where id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into shopping_cart ( open_id, product_no, product_num, customer_name, id_card, phone_num, play_time, status, sort, checked, create_time, update_time, application_no ) values ( #{openId}, #{productNo}, #{productNum}, #{customerName}, #{idCard}, #{phoneNum}, #{playTime}, #{status}, #{sort}, #{checked}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{applicationNo} )
mapper.delete:
